name: Model Protein Dimerization Network
description: Model protein dimerization networks to find equilibrium concentrations of dimers using ODE-based simulation
install: cd /tmp && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git biomni_repo && cd biomni_repo && pip install -e . && pip install numpy scipy

inputs.name: MONOMER_CONCENTRATIONS
inputs.description: JSON dictionary mapping monomer names to their initial concentrations (format: {"A": 1.0, "B": 2.0})

inputs.name: DIMERIZATION_AFFINITIES
inputs.description: JSON dictionary mapping dimer names to their association constants Ka (format: {"A-B": 1000000.0})

inputs.name: NETWORK_TOPOLOGY
inputs.description: JSON list of monomer pairs that can form dimers (format: [["A", "B"], ["B", "C"]])
